name: QuestionnaireAdmissionFamilyIssuesAndProblems
title: Questionnaire Admission Family Issues And Problems
description: Identifies the clinicians assessment of the clients skills and functioning level in the family setting at the time of admission.

concept.display: None (issues are temporary and relationships generally positive)
Slight (some issues present; occasional friction or discord)
Moderate (frequent disruptions or turbulence in family functioning)
